title: How to Open King Crab Legs

steps.title: Use both hands to lift the crab off of the table.
steps.content: Use both hands to lift the crab off of the table. King crab legs are the biggest, so you really may need both.

steps.title: You can apply pressure by hand or with a crab tool.
steps.content: You can apply pressure by hand or with a crab tool. You can even use a chopstick, fork, or the flat side of a knife if you prefer. Crab legs have four sections with three joints to break. [1] X Research source (More to enjoy.) A lot of people prefer to just use normal scissors. They can normally cut through a crab shell with no problem.

steps.title: Run the crab zipper down the soft side of the shell to open it.
steps.content: Run the crab zipper down the soft side of the shell to open it. Use one sweeping motion to open the leg. If you don’t have a zipper, use a fork or the sharp edge of a knife. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Reach inside of the leg and pull out the juicy meat.
steps.content: Reach inside of the leg and pull out the juicy meat. You can dip the crab in butter or cocktail sauce if you’d like.

steps.title: Crack, rip, and remove the meat from the other crab legs.
steps.content: Crack, rip, and remove the meat from the other crab legs. Use a crab zipper or crab cracker (nutcracker) for the smaller sections if needed. [3] X Research source
